column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Awesome service! Lady at the bakery part of was super helpful. We got the tiramisu macarons
column3: chai latte and chocolate walnut cookie. My friend thought the chocolate walnut cookie was okay but liked the chai latte. The lavender latte was pretty good
column4: not too sweet. The tiramisu macrons were a bit small for the price but good as well.
